about.title: Who Am I?
about.intro: I work as a full-stack developer with Java and JavaScript technologies. I am someone who loves to create, continuously learns, and sees software as a craft.

story.title: My Story
story.content: My interest in software began in childhood. I currently work as a full-stack developer at a startup. My goal is to deepen my knowledge in both backend architecture and user experience. I prioritize disciplined work and software quality.
